      @PutMapping(path="/comments/put/{id}") public Comment updateComment​(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody Comment request)

      id - id of comment

      Returns:
      newly inserted comment object

    • assignCommentToPost

      Assigns a comment to a post by id
      Parameters:
      postsId - id of post
      commentsId - id of comment

      success/fail message
